channel.title: SOLID on Crying Bear Studio
channel.description: Recent content in SOLID on Crying Bear Studio

item.title: Methodologists
item.description: Once upon a time, way back before I was even married, much less a divorced dad, my brother Andy and I worked together at a certain company. This was my first professional job and the beginning of my long, sordid IT career and I owe it all to nepotism. Anyway, shortly after I started at this company, there was an internal change in management and our divisional president was replaced with a new hire - a fellow of South Asian extraction.
